segment.source: App-V Installation Checklist
segment.target: App-V Installation Checklist

segment.source: The following checklist is intended to provide a high-level list of items to consider and outlines the steps you should take to install the Microsoft Application Virtualization (App-V) servers.
segment.target: The following checklist is intended to provide a high-level list of items to consider and outlines the steps you should take to install the Microsoft Application Virtualization (App-V) servers.

segment.source: Step
segment.target: Step

segment.source: Reference
segment.target: Reference

segment.source: Install the App-V Management Server.
segment.target: Install the App-V Management Server.

segment.source: If you are installing the Management Web Service, Management Console, or the Data Store on different servers, you can use the custom installation option.
segment.target: If you are installing the Management Web Service, Management Console, or the Data Store on different servers, you can use the custom installation option.

segment.source: How to Install Application Virtualization Management Server
segment.target: How to Install Application Virtualization Management Server

segment.source: Install the App-V Management Web Service.
segment.target: Install the App-V Management Web Service.

segment.source: (Optional ¹)
segment.target: (Optional ¹)

segment.source: How to Install the Management Web Service
segment.target: How to Install the Management Web Service

segment.source: Install the App-V Management Console.
segment.target: Install the App-V Management Console.

segment.target: (Optional ¹)

segment.target: How to Install the Management Console

segment.source: Install the App-V Data Store.
segment.target: Install the App-V Data Store.

segment.source: (Optional ¹)
segment.target: (Optional ¹)

segment.source: How to Install a Database
segment.target: How to Install a Database

segment.source: Install the App-V client.
segment.target: Install the App-V client.

segment.source: How to Manually Install the Application Virtualization Client
segment.target: How to Manually Install the Application Virtualization Client

segment.source: Install the App-V Sequencer.
segment.target: Install the App-V Sequencer.

segment.source: How to Install the Application Virtualization Sequencer
segment.target: How to Install the Application Virtualization Sequencer

segment.source: Install the App-V Streaming Server.
segment.target: Install the App-V Streaming Server.

segment.source: (This is optional and required only if you are installing the Streaming Server).
segment.target: (This is optional and required only if you are installing the Streaming Server).

segment.source: How to Install the Application Virtualization Streaming Server
segment.target: How to Install the Application Virtualization Streaming Server

segment.source: Create Content directories on the servers that will be used for streaming applications to users’ computers.
segment.target: Create Content directories on the servers that will be used for streaming applications to users’ computers.
